tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserEngagementMetrics (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id UUID,
    page_view_count INT,
    interaction_time DECIMAL,
    last_activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerChurnPrediction (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    churn_probability DECIMAL,
    prediction_date DATE,
    prediction_result VARCHAR(50),
    feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_engagement_metrics (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    last_login TIMESTAMP,
    engagement_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_churn_prediction (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    churn_likelihood FLOAT,
    prediction_date DATE,
    prediction_result VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE engagement_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    action_type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE user_segments (
    segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_name VARCHAR(50),
    criteria JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID primary key,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date TIMESTAMP,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);
